article.title: Sypris Awarded Multiyear Naval Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Sypris Electronics LLC, a subsidiary of Sypris Solutions Incorporated, has been awarded a contract from the U.S. Navy's Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Atlantic for its Model 101e data recording systems. The three-year contract has a ceiling of approximately $10.5 million if all options are exercised.
